items.question: What is Girls Run the World NFT?
answer: Girls run the World NFT- is a collection of 10k randomly generated and unique NFT of empowering Women who run the NFT World! NFT- ('non-fungible tokens') are unique, one-of-a-kind digital assets. They can be pretty much be anything digital - for example, artwork. What makes them unique is that we can now use a technology called the Blockchain to create a one-off digital certificate that's attached to that file - a certificate that proves ownership, and is publicly visible, forever.

items.question: What is our mission?
answer: Girls who run the World - To empower female entrepreneurs to stand at their own start line, knowing they’re strong, fearless, unstoppable, and most importantly - ready to run for their dreams!

items.question: What is our vision?
answer: Our vision for Girls who run the World is to create a world where women know their value, are not scared to set goals, share experiences, and learn from others.

items.question: What is our commitment to social action?
answer: 5 ETH- Malala Fund (which focuses on creating solutions that allow girls to access education)
5 ETH-The Girls who Code Foundation (that supports girls learning and working in the STEM field - science, technology, engineering, and math)
5 ETH-  She Should Run (a non-profit organization that opens the world of possibilities for women who are interested in running for public office and therefore letting their voices be heard)

items.question: Why Girls Run the World NFT?
answer: We’ll provide an opportunity to share different learning resources: Self-Development, Financial Education and Proper Budgeting, Networking Opportunities, Creating a Business / Brand, Our Book Picks for great reading time (by “our” we mean our amazing community, not just the founder’s picks).

By collecting Girls run the World NFT you'll have a voice in the community and help guide the direction of the project and development of the story. Already some great ideas have come from the community because if you want to go fast, go alone. If you want to go far, go together.

**Community and connectivity** are the pinnacles of our project’s mission. Holders of this NFT will be given free access to our conventions, where we will ensure the ability for each one of you to network and learn from top masterminds of the business as well as network with our fellow community members.

items.question: When will the NFTs be revealed after the sale?
answer: The NFTs will be revealed 48hrs after the end of the sale.
